segments.text: Hi.It ' s a wonderful wedding , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mary's father is a rich man , isn't he ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right , Mary's father is responsible for the entire wedding-arrangement , costs , etc . I think he must spend much money .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will Mary and her husband be ready to leave for their honeymoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.Look ! Mary is going to throw the bride bouquet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'll try to catch it .
segments.speaker: S2
